user.description: The user account ID of the user to add as a default actor. When not in GDPR-strict-mode this may be user key instead, however this behaviour is deprecated. You can add multiple users separated by a comma (for example, "user":["12345678-9abc-def1-2345-6789abcdef12", "abcdef12-3456-789a-bcde-f123456789ab"]).
